au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.name: L1=L2=14m_central_10_mar_2015
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) #sics.drive('nvs_lambda', 5.0) sics.set('/instrument/velocity_selector/wavelength',4.7) # Drive detector to short position sics.set('/instrument/detector/detector_y/speed', 53) driveDet(13200,0) # Drive guide to g2 config driveGuide(guideConfig.g2) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for g2) driveEntRotAp(180) #set sample ap to 12.5 mm sics.drive('apx', -72) # Drive beamstops up selBs(1) sics.set('beamcenterx', 95.00) sics.set('beamcenterz', 95.37)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(42, 100) # Drive attenuator to 270 driveAtt(270)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(38, 0) driveBsz(256)
